verbs.description: root beer float cake [ARG0: i] [V: add] [ARG1: root beer] [ARG2: to both the cake batter and fluffy frosting of this summery dessert] [ARGM-PRP: to get that great root beer float taste serve this moist cake to a bunch of hungry kids and watch it disappear] —kat thompson prineville oregon cake
